== Using ArduIMU with !ArduPilot ==

http://ardupilot.googlecode.com/svn/images/IMG_47071.jpg

You can use ArduIMU to replace the thermopile sensors in the [http://diydrones.ning.com/profiles/blogs/ardupilot-main-page ArduPilot autopilot]. 

This requires a slight different setup, which is described in the !ArduPilot manual [http://code.google.com/p/ardupilot/wiki/ArduIMU here].
